name: Stable Ruin
description: Remains of a stable—wooden stalls half-collapsed, roof mostly gone. Smell of old hay and leather. Animals shelter here but it's not maintained.
lighting_quality: Dappled through broken roof. Shadows shift with sun. Dark corners.
temperature_range: Moderate—wood and remaining roof provide some shelter.
acoustic_quality: Creaking wood. Animal sounds amplified. Intimate despite size.
atmosphere: Haunted by former purpose. Comfort and decay intertwined.
